game.name: Normality
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A sinister force now controls the city of Neutropolis. A once-thriving city full of beauty and light, Neutropolis has been reduced to a a stagnant pit of apathy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A sinister force now controls the city of Neutropolis. A once-thriving city full of beauty and light, Neutropolis has been reduced to a a stagnant pit of apathy.

reviewHighlights.text: 2017년인데 이런게임 찾아서 하지 마세요. 쓰레기통 뒤져서 똥 묻는거임.
